cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.csv

Class CollectionImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.csv.Importer
      • cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.csv.CollectionImporter

  • public class CollectionImporter
extends Importer
    Provides a single public method for handling the creation of new Collections, adding Content to StaticCollections, defining the ContentSearch criteria for DynamicCollections, and lastly, for searching over these newly created Collections. Each sub-task under loading the primary CSV is handled by private methods.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Killeffer <rayden7@gmail.com>
    See Also:
    ICollectionServiceAPI, CollectionServiceAPI, Collectible, Collection, ContentProxy, StaticCollection, DynamicCollection

    • Method Detail

      • importCollectionsFile

        public static void importCollectionsFile(java.lang.String guid,
                         java.lang.String filename)
                                  throws ImportException,
                                         ParseException,
                                         CollectionNotFoundException
        Public method for importing Collection items into the product catalog. Note that any Content items referenced in the import file must already exist in the Product catalog first, or the import of that Collection items will not work. Throws ImportException on error accessing or processing the input Collections File.
        Parameters:
        guid - access token for carrying out restricted interface actions such as this
        filename - file with collection items to load into the product catalog
        Throws:
        ImportException - thrown when encountering non-parse related exceptions in the import process
        ParseException - thrown when encountering any issues parsing the input file related to the format of the file contents
        CollectionNotFoundException
